content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lever
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "andesite_stairs", "quantity": 32, "index": 19}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 49, "index": 21}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 35, "index": 28}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "acacia_door", "quantity": 15, "index": 31}]
thought: To craft a lever I need to place a stick on top of a cobblestone. Since there is a stick in slot 16, I will move it to slot 1.
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lever
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite_stairs", "quantity": 32, "index": 19}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 49, "index": 21}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 35, "index": 28}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "acacia_door", "quantity": 15, "index": 31}]
thought: I have placed the stick in the crafting grid, now I need to place a cobblestone below it. There is a cobblestone in slot 29, so I will move it to slot 4.
act: move from slot 29 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lever
inventory=[{"type": "lever", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "andesite_stairs", "quantity": 32, "index": 19}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 49, "index": 21}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 35, "index": 28}, {"type": "acacia_door", "quantity": 15, "index": 31}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the lever, I will move it from the crafting grid to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
